post.description: Create an instance of 'Territories' with the given payload of type 'Territory' in JSON format.

get.description: Retrieve a collection of 'Territories' with all or some selected properties in the given order by specifying the given filter condition.

patch.description: Update an instance of 'Territories' with the given payload of type 'Territory' in JSON format and with the specified id.

get.description: Retrieve all or some selected properties from an instance of 'Territories' with the given id.

delete.description: Delete an instance of 'Territories' with the specified id.
